name: Bound
shortDescription: The character is tied up, handcuffed, or otherwise restrained. Bound characters can't move and suffer a -4 penalty to all actions. Breaking free requires an opposed Strength roll.

name: Distracted
shortDescription: The character is distracted and suffers a -2 penalty to all trait rolls. This condition is usually temporary and ends when the distraction is removed.

name: Entangled
shortDescription: The character is caught in a net, vines, or similar restraint. Entangled characters can't move and suffer a -2 penalty to all actions. Breaking free requires an opposed Strength roll.

name: Fatigue
shortDescription: The character is tired or exhausted. Each level of Fatigue imposes a -1 penalty to all trait rolls. A character with three levels of Fatigue is Incapacitated.

name: Shaken
shortDescription: The character is shaken up and can't perform actions except to move at half pace. Shaken characters can attempt to recover with a Spirit roll at the start of their turn.

name: Stunned
shortDescription: The character is stunned and can't take any actions. The character can attempt to recover with a Vigor roll at the start of their turn.

name: Vulnerable
shortDescription: The character is vulnerable and attackers gain +2 to their attack rolls against the character. This condition is usually caused by being surprised or caught off guard.

name: Wound
shortDescription: The character has suffered a wound. Each wound imposes a -1 penalty to all trait rolls. A character with three wounds is Incapacitated. Wounds require medical attention to heal.
